alert.note: Alert for Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; East Bay Interior Valleys; Marin Coastal Range; North Bay Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 9:57PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Marin County through 1030 PM PST... At 955 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Stinson Beach, or 8 miles southwest of San Rafael, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Richmond, San Rafael, Novato, San Pablo, Hercules, Pinole, Mill Valley, San Anselmo, Larkspur, Corte Madera, Tiburon, Fairfax, Sausalito, Tara Hills, San Geronimo, El Sobrante, Black Point-Green Point, Strawberry, Stinson Beach and Rodeo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; East Bay Interior Valleys; Marin Coastal Range; North Bay Interior Valleys
